website_summaries.verdict: The complete package -- good sound, great night vision, sharp HD, technology that reduces blurring, and fantastic auto-record features. You won't find a better dash cam for the price.
pros: Great night vision with full HD, Has an adhesive mount instead of an iffy suction cup
Installation process is incredibly smooth and easy
cons: Adhesive mount is permanent and, as such, is difficult to clean up should you remove camera

customer_reviews.title: Camera has paid for itself!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for about a year now and it's still working fine. I was able to review footage from a trip to my local Toyota dealership. I have a highly modified sport car and this camera caught the dealership abusing my car, damaging it, and driving it improperly. Was awarded nearly $1,500 in damages all because of this dash cam (somehow they never even saw it in my windshield). So, the camera has more then paid for itself in only the first year of owning it. Many of my friends have bought this camera as a result. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless when there is an accident - does not play the particular movie clip
customer_reviews.text: The camera works great if you don't have an accident. Easy to install and clear pictures. But last week we were involved in an accident and wanted to review the clip during which the accident occurred and here is the message we received: "Item is unplayable, please reacquire the content. " Note: Clips before and after the accident play well. It is just this crucial clip that has problems. But that's the reason why we purchased the camera; in case of the accident. Bottom line: Camera is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic product. Saved me from a civil suit last ...
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic product. Saved me from a civil suit last week when some **** ran a redlight and tried to blame it on me. The V1 dashcam functioned as advertised and I am physically fine and mentally stress free. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Austin Reid

customer_reviews.title: good responses
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick customer service. Held up well onto a steep windshield (Jeep Wrangler).
customer_reviews.author: jp!

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable battery wears out after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for both cars. First unit would not hold a charge out of the box. Seller replaced unit promptly and it is still working. Second unit is failing to hold a charge after 13 months of service. I also reviewed the recorded video, and it has not captured anything for the past 4 months! The red recording light has been blinking happily this whole time, and it's supposed to be deleting the oldest clip to record a new clip. So there was no indication that anything was wrong until it powered up and asked for the date to be set. Unfortunately the 1 year warranty has expired. I will not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Rework

customer_reviews.title: Drivers are getting worse and worse. Protect yourself with one of these!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and had them put in by a professional auto electrical/stereo shop. Took them 30min to do each car. 4 months in and they still work great. Gives us some peace of mind to know that if anything happens we can prove our side. The only thing I wish we did was to get the rear facing camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: POS camera that doesn’t even work.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA This camera is a massive pos it won’t stay on, shuts off the second you try and do anything, I’ve spent lots of money on different Micro SD cards and use their recommended microSD card, it won’t connect to the app, because it shuts off when you follow their directions to get the WiFi on (which is what the video shows), it won’t even stay on. Did i add that it won’t charge? Yeah it won’t charge either. What a massive pos and I’ll be returning it for my money back. I should have bought a Garmin.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbi Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Company backs the product.
customer_reviews.text: looses date often, stops recording at times for no reason was my first review. Someone from Rexing contacted me about the product and offered to send me another one at no charge. Sent the item fast and have had it in the truck for 2 weeks now. No failure and constant recording when vehicle is running. I hope it continues to work as it is now, but if not i feel that the company will take care of the problem. Thanks for reaching out to me
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very lightweight and that a good thing if you want something to stay put when its in a hanging position. It takes a nice video so far and I like that I can tuck it up underneath my rear view mirror so its out of my sight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolute trash: cannot hold a charge, narrow angle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this and installed it in my car. Was confused after the first few uses when the "low battery" warning appeared despite turning the camera off. After bringing it inside to fully charge, checking the battery, and driving to the store, the camera was dead again, unable to hold a charge for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, what little video it did record has a fairly narrow angle, unable to capture my entire hood much less cars in the next lane, and quality is pretty poor at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: this product has so many good reviews, so I was very excited to get it, but it is so dated, the technology it uses looks like dated back to at least 15 years, during the era I was using Garman gps, now with everything touchscreen, you still need to push buttons on this, and everything else such as the plastic shell, also looks cheap, returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: A good choice in dash cams
customer_reviews.text: Update: Rexing sent me a replacement unit and it is working great. I've been using the new dash cam for over a month without a single one of the issues I experienced with the first unit. I have changed my mind and recommend the dash cam. The video quality is crisp, even at night. It's a nice looking unit, but it has started locking up constantly. The record light will be blinking, but the screen will be frozen and not recording. Tonight, it even went so far as to reset the date and time. So aggravating that I just missed the return date for Amazon. It's not worth the money. I'll be looking for something else to take its place.
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice package
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 2 years and I've never needed to go to it for any reason. I have it hard wired into my truck so it comes on when I start the truck and stops after I shut off the ignition. The problem I've had is the auto off. The camera is supposed to stay on for a shortperiod after I turn off the car. It doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D.

customer_reviews.title: Camera failed during crash. Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this camera the whole time I have had it until today. I was in an accident and the video file that was my accident doesn't work. The one before and after does, but not the video I need. This totally defeats my purpose of having this thing. I thoroughly regret not choosing a different camera. This one fails when you need it most. Terrible camera!
customer_reviews.author: KUCOOP

customer_reviews.title: Worthless, videos don't save properly
customer_reviews.text: I've needed this camera four times. Three of those times, the camera failed to save the video I needed. Without reliability this product is worthless. The quality is great when it works. "When it works" historically has meant "all possible times other than the ones I need." Updated 1/6/2020: I have 2 hours of footage that end 15 seconds before my accident. This product is worthless
customer_reviews.author: D. McAloon

customer_reviews.title: will only last one year.
customer_reviews.text: purchased 01/17//17. today is 11/19/18, the screen just went dark for no apparent reason. don't waste your money on this poor quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dash cam, so I have nothing to compare it to, but I love it! The video quality is excellent. It doesn't have a WiFi connection, but that doesn't matter because you just pop the SD card out when you want to review a video. The videos record in short, 3 minute segments, so it's really easy to find the video you need to review and drag/drop it into a backup file. It comes with a super long cord so you can hide it in your lining and paneling. The sticky stuff is REALLY secure! It was practically impossible to get it off my windshield when I moved my camera to a new car.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Half of files corrupted and unwatchable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dashcam for 3 years and just checked video since I was sideswiped in a hit and run. I was lucky that the particular file from that time was watchable because half of the others were corrupted and wouldn't play at all. It's great when it works, but since there's no way to know when that will be, I'm going to have to get a more reliable dashcam.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice dash cam
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cam. Video quality is great both at night and day. My only problem is connecting the wifi. I read a post that said one should format the sd card to FAT32 and download the fire ware. Prior to reading the post, I called Rexing USA and the tech guy did not even mention the FAT32 and fire ware. I hope Rexing will include a user guide that will address these issues. I might return the cam if the wifi issue is not resolve.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Video
customer_reviews.text: The audio and video on this small camera is excellent, just make sure you pair it with a high-speed micro SD card. Drive safe!
customer_reviews.author: 57 Ike

customer_reviews.title: Not Working out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This camera come with all defects possible, i'm using the Micro SD recommended by the manufacturer and keep giving me errors about cluster size and other errors (try with other 2 brands with the same result), follow directions to the letter on how to format the card and all other stuff, trying to connect to my phone via wi-fi is impossible, everytime i try the camera shut down, i was expecting a much better product for the price, returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: GABRIEL PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a Prueevo and an Aukey dash cam over the past couple years. The Prueevo had OK video quality but died just outside the warranty period. The Aukey had somewhat better video quality, however picture quality did get a bit worse the older it got....and this one also quit working a couple months after its warranty period. I've only had this Rexing for a couple weeks, but I have reviewed the video....and it looks very good. I also have had success connecting the Rexing app on my S9+ to the camera. I mention this because people have had issues with the app. Not I. All works as I hoped. I will update this review if things go awry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Great footage for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've installed 2 of these and used the hardwire kit. They work really well and you don't even realize they are in the vehicle from the drivers seat. I rarely view footage as they are for just in case scenarios. The app with live view on your cell is kind of neat. It would be nice to be able to review previous footage view bluetooth, if that function is available I haven't figured it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The dash cam is pretty average. Video quality is okay but I feel like it is hard to see plates the majority of the time. Build quality feels cheap, but it's light which is good so it doesn't fall of the windshield. The included adhesive 3M and sticks no problem. I was also letdown that no micro SD card was included out of the box for the price. The settings are nice and there are a good bit of options. It's an okay dash cam, but I would weigh your options.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Biller

customer_reviews.title: Rexing provides reliable products.
customer_reviews.text: I had a V1 that "up and died"; so I ordered this model. Just started using it this past week; so I will just be getting around to reviewing the footage on the microSD over the weekend. I imagine it will be as good as, if not better than, the V1 that it replaced. After reviewing the card, I will be better able to address the rating of picture quality and night vision. Overall though I am impressed with Rexing products. I transferred the GPS from the "deceased" unit to this unit as well. Delivery was very quick and properly package to avoid damage during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Good dash cam, just dont use Kingston cards in it.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to make sure everything was going to go right with this new dash cam on our 4,000 mile road trip. So we bought the recommended Kingston Canvas Go! 64GB SD card for it. What a mistake. Card developed errors and only recorded about 4 minutes of video in 12 hours of driving. My wife is very disappointed that none of the drive out of Big Bend was captured. I was even more disappointed that it failed to capture being almost run off the road by an inattentive semi drive. We purchased a Sandisk card at Walmart and it worked fine the whole rest of the trip and every mile since.
customer_reviews.author: Hofy

customer_reviews.title: Works fine as a basic dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Once you try and move into the parking mode features things go downhill. Poor documentation leaves you wondering if things are working correctly and support provided contradictory information. I did have the Rexing 3 wire installation kit along with the camera as the parking mode was one of the important features I was looking for. Product also felt cheap and the internal LED lights shined out of product shell and button seams indicating poor fitment. Overall I was unhappy with the product and decided to return it as I didn't feel it was terribly well described.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and good video quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a dash cam after covid-19 and George Floyd protest because there's less CHP and cops on road nowadays. This camera is perfect for the price that I can afford. It's very easy to install and operation of the camera is so easy to understand. Best of all this camera had great quality video and able to read license plate of cars in front of me. I just got the front camera for now and will look at GPS and rear camera options when I have more money. Overall I like it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ung

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Dashcam and I am not disappointed. Th picture quality is outstanding! I got this for dual use in my Everyday vehicle and easy transfer to my motorhome. My rig has an AC outlet near the windshield that runs off the inverter so I was able to use an AC adapter there with USB cable and the 12v cable in my car. NOTE: The USB cable supplied cause flickering in the unit's display but I used one I already had and it is fine. The wifi is a little wonky, requiring you to activate it each time on the unit before connecting which requires a lot of hands on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: RoyT

customer_reviews.title: Great budget dash cam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dash cam. Daytime footage is very good, clear enough to read license plates and street signs. Night time is not nearly as clear, but good enough to see what's going on. The UI is intuitive and responsive. The physical buttons make muting or saving a recording very easy while driving. I like the sleek profile of the dash cam, making it easy to tuck behind the mirror, out of the driver's line of sight. I can't speak for the reliability as I've only been using it for a few days, but it seems to be well made and I have not had any issues yet. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive pad fails
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camera but be ready to have problems with the two sided adhesive pad. I ended up using "E0600" industrial strength adhesive to hold the mount to the pad.I live in Southern California but the days are only getting into low 80s right now. Not what I expected this early into summer. Hopefully, an adhesive said to withstand 180deg will hold up. Solve the adhesion issue and I'd give it 5 stars. I was also looking for a polarized filter. I was able to use some epoxy and fit this one to it perfectly. Oh!...and hard-wire into your car. Makes all the difference over a cord hanging from your windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Bram

customer_reviews.title: Safety & Peace Of Mind
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 Rexing dash cameras. The first one was added to our RV in 2018 and the second added to our car July 2019. Should we be involved in a vehicle mishap the camera could well prove very useful by providing an accurate timeline of the events. In a growing litigious society with few willing to take responsibility we felt this was necessary. The decision was easy after friends related events in which their dash camera proved the real cause of the accident. The Rexing is small enough to readily fit on the windshield without obstructing vision.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it's price!
customer_reviews.text: Great dash cam!!! supports up to 128GB, I changed my settings to record in loops of 10 minutes in full HD. It requires constant power to record, however, the good thing is that if you want it to record while your car is parked, you can plug it into a power bank. I self-installed it and it was super easy. Not far from a car person, I love electronics but when it comes to car installations of stuff typically I hire someone but I was able to do this one myself. Video quality is superb! I have 0 complaints and thinking about getting a rear window one too.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness Guy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great images
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced another dashcam that failed and was not well supported by the manufacturer. The Rexing is compact and comes with everything you need to install and conceal the power cord. They even provide a tool for removing dashboard panels. This was a big help in hiding the power cable. They also provide adhesive backed clips to run the power cable through; I only needed one. I also purchased the suction cup mount to make relocating easier. That turned out to be another help in the overall installation process. The documentation was clear and easy to follow. I was able to also download a PDF of the documentation from their support website. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Staley

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail-updated
customer_reviews.text: I finally got this unit professionally installed 3 days ago, and it turns off and on by itself, freezes, and the buttons are sometimes non responsive. Even though I have it set to continue to record over previous data it still flashes up saying the card is full. The GPS that I bought for it, which is from the same company, is not working. Finally, the rear camera I bought with it isn't working either. All in all an epic fail. Update: They have recently sent me a new unit and now everything is working perfectly I will try to remember to update in a few months to let everyone know how it's going.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Birchfield

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This camera stopped working after a couple months. Beware, if your battery charger port in the car doesn’t shut off when you shut the car off it could cause a problem with the battery. I now have a broken camera and had to pay to have my battery recharged!!! Update: I must say I’m very impressed with the customer service. After seeing my initial review they contacted me and asked if I wanted a refund or a replacement. I asked for a replacement and sent the broken one back. I just received a new one and it’s working like a charm! Hopefully I don’t have any more problems. It’s a fabulous dash cam. Very clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: D. Liberati

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after about 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to install however its cable dangles in front of the passenger seat. It captures clear images and has a wide angle but less than 3 weeks of use it starting turning itself off randomly. The first few times it responded well when I reset it but now it will not even do that. My return window has closed (installed it a couple of months after I purchased it), so I have just wasted $100 for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Boncuk

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Installation was quick and easy. I opted for the cigarette lighter port. Placed my sd card in there and you can choose to format the sd card in the dash cam itself. Picture crystal clear and I didn't seem to have a problem with the dash cam considering I am always on the go. This means my truck (Toyota Tacoma 2016) is off and on constantly. Dash cam started no hitch or no problems so far. Like I said, I feel this was a great price point considering it is 4k and the wifi to connect to my phone worked flawlessly as well.
customer_reviews.author: TeamNiKe

customer_reviews.title: I really like this dash cam
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dash cam. When purchasing I knew I wanted to get something decent that wasn't going to cost me an arm and a leg. This was the product I settled on. Nothing too fancy but it certainly gets the job done and gives me piece of mind knowing that I have proof in the event anything should happen. The picture quality is surprisingly good and the night time vision works way better than I expected. The biggest thing that could be improved is the battery life. The second you unplug it from the power source the battery dies. Other than that, it's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: CgeorgeTop Contributor: Knitting

customer_reviews.title: Runs A Bit Warm
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact unit. Delivers good hi-def picture. My only concern is that it seems to run a bit warm, be it a short trip or a long trip. At the end of my trip I remove the camera from its mount and every time it feels too warm from its operation. Heat kills electronics. Soon I will be out on the road for eight hours, so we will see how it holds up for that duration.
customer_reviews.author: Villhelm

customer_reviews.title: Good -- however, nothing lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: Have had this camera for 2 and a half years -- has been working great, and thankfully I have not needed it for anything major. However, it's in dire need of a replacement. The camera does not hold a charge anymore, and has not done so for the past year. This makes the camera also not retain the proper date, and recently when looking for a specific video I realized that it has been looping on re-recording only two videos (i.e., it retains everything that it has recorded up to about last year, probably to when the battery stopped holding a charge, but then you'll only get the last two recorded videos for anything more recent).
customer_reviews.author: Alex Comanescu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one. All of them freeze after a few minutes playing. But it works most of time: Look at video. It got this close call on camera. I recently got an email from customer service about micro sd being incompatible and to get a Lexar instead. I'm going to get it in the next few weeks and see if it becomes more stable. Update: I got the Lexar microsd card and it works perfectly. I had a scandisk before and it was causing the problem I mention. Im really satisfied with the product now.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great dash cam, but careful, It will shoot your micro sd cards out!
customer_reviews.text: Besides my rant on it shooting out the micro sad cards, this camera has been a trooper. It’s been 2 years now and it’s ran 24 hrs a day. The mount has also done well in direct sun for 10 hours a day. Just remember to unmount it when you take the card out. This thing shoots them out like bullets when you try to take them out or put them in. My car is now a graveyard for 3 $150 micro sd cards. Once they shoot out you’ll never find them. And your video will be gone as well.
customer_reviews.author: egeorge96

customer_reviews.title: Have had it about 2 years now, still working
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this camera about 2 years ago. It’s been through 2 Louisiana summers in the car 99% of the time. Still working great. We ordered another camera a few months ago because it was cheaper and included an inside and rear camera. Was supposed to go in our second car. It died the next day. My husband was just in a wreck that would have been no fault if we didn’t have this. Our car is totaled and we’re looking at thousands in medical bills. Very thankful we had this one to prove the other party was at fault and it’s held up so well. Will stick with this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: brizey93

customer_reviews.title: Accident/Road Rage Caught on Cam
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with having an extra sense of security. In just the first few weeks I caught a car flip over by running into a lifted truck. I was able to share the footage with police. It was a rainy day and it happened a bit further away, but it still helped. I lost track of how many people running red lights I've caught on camera. I only wish I ordered the rear facing Rexing V1p. A lot of issues seem to come from agitated drivers behind you, not in front.
customer_reviews.author: J Helmka

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but need a important improvement
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a very good vision and sound quality. I would give a five star until my car accident happened 2 days ago. Someone hit my back of car when I was waiting for red light. The moment my car get hit, the camera drop off the slot and got disconnect from the cable. When I put data into computer to check the video when . This important 10min was missing. It didn’t get saved because the cable suddenly disconnect. I am thinking maybe use supper glue or something to secure the camera. Otherwise, what’s the point to have this camera, if those important moments can not be saved.
customer_reviews.author: Cui Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Not that great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this it had really good reviews . First impression of the camera was it seemed very cheap . I plugged it into my car and it worked fine for about three minutes and then it just turned off . Seems to have a mind of its own and decides to work when it wants to. And it was actually kind of complicated to setup and it doesn’t come with an SD card so beware . I returned mine. I’m giving it a two star because the camera was pretty good and it was really good quality picture but overall just wasn’t a good set up. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: still working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit after being involved in an accident in 2017. Though I haven't been downloading content, I decided to do so after an idiot moved into my lane and almost hit me. Was happy the incident was captured well. This camera does not do super in low light, but there was enough from headlights that everything I would have needed as proof got on the clip.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Elwell

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good product, nothing to complain about so far...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first dash cam that I have every used, so I have nothing to compare it with. It does what I expect it to do...I think. I really won't know for sure until the day comes when I need it. I was concerned about the reported problems with double sided tape mounting system so I purchased the optional suction cup mount. Since I travel a lot this also allows me to use the dash cam in rental vehicles. The dash cam was very easy to set up and install. I like the tilting camera. It can adjusted very easily for each vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review - Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review. I initially purchased this product and did not have a great experience. The first iteration of the camera appeared to have been built with low quality plastic and it gave out on me. Rexing recently reach out to me and advised that they would mail out a new one. I have now been using the camera for about 1-2 weeks and have not experienced any issues. The quality appears to have improved and the camera comes with just about all the items you need to discretely install it. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking into an economical camera. I will update my review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: The camera itself performed well and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself performed well and is easy to use. But the adhesive pads for laying the cable around the wind shield are of low quality. They quickly deteriorated in the summer and I am in New York so it’s not extremely hot. When finally the camera fell off the wind shield because the biggest pad for mounting the camera also detached, I had to give up. Update: Bought the Rexing suction mount for the camera and it works fine so upgrading to 2 stars. But the cable mounting clips still keep falling off no matter what adhesives I use. Now the cable is dangling below the rear view mirror which is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: JIAN Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera ! Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very very impressed with the manufacturer of this product. They are on top of their game and truly care about their customers. I had an issue with one of their previous dash cams and they replaced it no questions asked ! Rexing thank you for making my life that much easier. I don’t have full coverage and having this dash cam in my car makes me feel better about it, hoping to get full coverage soon but still plan on using this dash can :). Great quality! Too!
customer_reviews.author: brenda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Seriously impressed with the dependability.
customer_reviews.text: I live in NY, which means we get extremely hot and humid Summers and then freezing winters. I've had this thing since September 2015 and I drive multiple times a day every day. This thing has turned on every time the car turned on, recorded every second of my driving and hasn't given me any trouble. I haven't had a situation where I had to use it yet, but just knowing it works so well gives me peace of mind. That's why I gave it a 5 star for material quality despite feeling cheaply built.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey a little difficult to use but they work OK. Acceptable /price high should be 50 $
customer_reviews.text: I got five of these they were good they’re 100 bucks it’s an ok deal. Little pain in the ass you have to format it once a month or it’ll stop recording unexpectedly. Little difficult to navigate The features, but I like Them. they should be about 50 bucks but I paid $100 because I need them in my work trucks and we have them all we want to keep them uniform. If they don’t lower the price I will buy a different brand in the future they should come down in price.
customer_reviews.author: Crusher

customer_reviews.title: Screen went out quickly...
customer_reviews.text: Camera seemed to work for a few months. Quality is not great. The screen stopped displaying anything except for white screen. Useless now. Don’t know why it took me so long to review.
customer_reviews.author: roberto hernandez

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money, the camera quality is great. I installed this myself by lifting up the carpet lining along the windshield in order to hide the charging cable, I then tucked the cable in the door behind the weather stripping and then tucked the cable underneath the steering colum paneling (I had to unscrew this). The camera runs immediately when the car turns on and turns off within seconds of stopping the engine (or cutting power to the car, it'll stay on in an idle situation such as when you turn off the engine to talk to a police officer - it can still record the conversation). No regrets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Always Record, Cuts Off Randomly, Records at 8x Speed, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I just give up. Every time I want to look at footage, this camera failed to capture it. I'm just going to throw it away/never buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: MUST GET!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking better safe than sorry, well it came in handy. I only had it for about 2 months and than i was driving to work and got into an antecedent and it got the whole thing even a little after too. The camera is easy to install and does't hinder you view of the road. This camera saved me form going to court and helped me with everything. Definitely worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: My Third Rexing Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my third Rexing dash cam. My wife and I each have one in our vehicles. My original died about after about 2.5 years so I was forced to buy another. They work well enough that I figured purchasing another is probably just easiest. They have decent image quality and are easy enough to setup and use. Attached is a video of a woman running a red light and flipping my truck. The Rexing dash cam is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Edubya

customer_reviews.title: Rexing removed delayed shutdown feature which makes park monitoring useless.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a smart wiring kit with this camera to use the park monitoring feature. Bad news is that rexing decided to take the “delayed shutdown” feature off of this v1 4k dash cam, so now every time I shut my door the park monitoring feature comes on. Making it useless. So I had to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Purdin

customer_reviews.title: Best dashcam!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 of these cameras so far for all my family cars and will be getting 2 more for a friend to install on his cars. Absolutely love them, especially the way they sit on a windshield is perfect, because I do not like hanging cameras in front of me. Recently this camera helped me a lot because I was in accident and video proved it was not my fault. Definitely have to have one in a car!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Easy Setup
customer_reviews.text: Did some research before choosing a budget minded dash cam. The V1 seemed like a good choice. Now that it's in my hands I'm not let down. Some article mentioned an issue with the ad card being hard to install/remove, but it works great for me. Mounted this on my '88 Isuzu Trooper. The windshield is pretty vertical. Works great though. Have enough adjustment to get the camera angle right from several different possible mounting points. WiFi connected pretty easily. Lots of cable for mounting in any location. Overall a great value and easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: kbadertscher06

customer_reviews.title: best dash cam I ever had
customer_reviews.text: this is a great dash cam. I have been using it since I bought it and it has been flawless. It's easy to set up, wire and mount. It dosn't get in the way of your vision and the photo quality will take of most accidents in it's field of vision. license plate and time stamp are a nice feature even if you can't get a clear shot of the other car's plate. It will place you at the right place at the right time. I just bought a second one for our new car.
customer_reviews.author: notfis

customer_reviews.title: Good reliable camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Rexing dash cam. I had my previous one for almost 3 years before I fried the electronics. During the pandemic I left it attached to the window in blistering heat, please don't do that. The camera always takes crisp clear video, even at night, and is easily adjustable. There are many other cameras out there, but I found this one to be reliable and sturdy, which is why I bought a second one. I haven't hooked up the permanent wire assembly as I switch it between vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: John Rosansky

customer_reviews.title: Useless at night - **UPDATED**
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sleek design Nice price point Decent audio recording Easy set-up Cons: Night recording is terrible, almost unusable(cannot see street signs or license plates of cars nearby which is a big negative for a dashcam) Day recording also has very bad blur that can easily induce a headache, but is much better than night recording. Verdict: If you're on a budget and don't drive at night, this dashcam might work for you! Otherwise, if you can afford a bit more, it might be worth the investment to look elsewhere. UPDATE: Rexing is making it right by sending me the Gen3 which should mitigate my current issue. Updated to 5-stars
customer_reviews.author: Nadeem

customer_reviews.title: $100 dashcam is pretty good but, a couple issues.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dashcam. I looked at a lot of them, and did as much research as I could. Since this was one of the highest rated ones here I pulled the trigger. The daytime recordings are great. The night recordings are a little grainy, but you can still see what's going on. I would have given it 5 stars if the app and wifi worked better. There were a few times I tried to connect to it and it said it failed. But overall I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: BigD666

customer_reviews.title: You will be messing with it for hours.
customer_reviews.text: Just like every other dashcam I get, NO CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO MAKE IT WORK! I'm not going to sit here for an hour and figure out formatting SD cards and how to upload a recording, just make a mount, let me stick the moint to the dash, and record it, why make it so difficult?
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Okay dashcam
customer_reviews.text: It's okay dashcam with solid 3-stars value. There are many 5 star reviews because they propose free SD card. However, overall quality and function of the camera is solid 3 stars. So far, I have issues when at least once a week I need to format SD card and reinsert it. Otherwise, it won't record anything. But overall for the price it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Pavlo Terpak

customer_reviews.title: Camera works great!  Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great. Easy to use. I updated to the 32 card for road trips but it isn't necessary with the looping feature. Had problems with the first one. Battery wouldn't hold a charge so camera wouldn't work at all even when plugged in. THEY CONTACTED ME after reading my review. So suprised. Every once in a while a company goes beyond expectations and customers are actually treated with EXCELLENCE. Great customer service and this is a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Van Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: So it seems the issue with the lower reviews is some people are receiving products that aren't genuine. I received the right product. It works great. My only complaint is that the screen has a sort of blue tint over it seen on other reviews. I thought this was going to show up on the video file BUT IT DOESNT. the actual video clips are crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty much a near perfect dash cam. Setup takes a little bit, but it is easy enough. I like that the time, date amd license plate number is hard coded on the video. The videos record on the memory card and there is no worry about filling up the card because it keeps recording over the old files. The camera starts recording when you start the car and stops recording a few seconds after you shut off the car. The biggest complaint is running the power cord. Trying to run the cord so it is out of veiw of the windshield and not dangling.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of this on Prime day. I never thought I really needed it before. After what happen to me today, I am glad I have this dash cam. I T-boned a guy who ran the red light, my dash cam clearly recorded the whole accident. After viewing the video, the police officer immediately told me it was the other guy's fault. Thanks for this little device, it saved me from hassles. It's definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ye

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. I already owned one of their 1080p dash cams, but I decided to upgrade because I wanted 4k video and wifi connectivity. Video quality is great, camera is easy to use, I'm very happy. Cons: The controls on the unit itself are a little confusing but not terrible. Connecting to the camera via the iPhone app and using the app is slow, but it gets the job done. For the price, I'm very happy with this product, thus the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SecretAsianMann

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera to provide a record of accidents or encounters with arrogant police officers.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dash cam and the customer service is outstanding. I bought the camera because my wife had a couple of accidents that were not her fault. There is no better way to settle a dispute than having a video record of what transpired. I also had a bad experience with a local cop. I wish that I had been able to record that incident. Most lawmen are courteous and professional but not all are. Sooner or later we all will probably have a need for a dash cam. This is a good one. I highly recommend the Rexing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one since I dropped my first one and it fell right on the lens. This one was good till about a week ago where it no longer keeps the time or date correctly. It doesn't record properly anymore either. I reformatted the card and it seemed to be fine but it still won't keep the time or date but stays frozen on the day I set it. I updated the firmware but no fix at all. For 89 bucks you can pick up the Roav which so far has been a champ. It comes with a memory card included and gps plus you can DL to your phone.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but be prepared to purchase additional items.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Rexing V1 because of online reviews. I've only used it once so far. Initial positives: Daytime picture quality was great. It was fairly easy to set up and toggle through the menu to change settings. The online guide shows you can loop up to 10 min sessions but the camera only goes to 3 mins. Comes with 2 sticky mounts so you can move the camera between 2 cars. What I'd like to see improved: include the hard wires and gps. Both are available for purchase separately. It would also be nice for the sd card to be included.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Woos

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and features.  Simple to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with this camera and was afforded the opportunity to try a new one which functioned fine. I must have first received a defective unit. The picture quality is great and it has excellent features. It is simple to set up, stylish, and easy to use. The only issue I had was with the foam used to attach the camera to the windshield. The camera would not stay put so I used 3M VHB double sided tape to mount the camera and have had no further issues. All and all this is a great dash cam but needs better mounting adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Captures the good, the bad, and the ugly on the road.
customer_reviews.text: My wife convinced me that we needed a dash cam after she was in a car accident, and so we bought the Rexing V1. In the year or so that we've had it, it's become one of the best purchases for our vehicle. In addition to being super helpful in the event of an accident, the Rexing captured some really great moments from a recent cross-country road trip too (see the photos I uploaded). It was able to withstand the desert heat during summer and always captured great quality video and sound. We have ours tucked behind the rear-view mirror and I don't even notice it any more. It faithfully does its job every time we're behind the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: zerbekw

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Someone shattered my front car window for ? fun?. So it was replaced. So now I want to make sure to catch the guy. This has High rating, very easy to handle. Plug in and GO..... Hardest part is where to place it on the windshield. I placed it hidden and now cant see the monitor. Never fear they thought of that abs supply two placement holders. Buy if you want an easy to setup and use GGGGGreat system...
customer_reviews.author: Robert BJ Hill

customer_reviews.title: Need to format SD card every so often!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality pic and performance but you need to go to settings and reformat the card to clear it every month or so. I witnessed an accident but when I went to the card it only had recordings from months ago. I did some inquiring and found out these cards do this when you do not do this formatting from time to time. Otherwise I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: 2 years later and still working
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this (and every other) dash cam is that the battery is garbage. I'v always had the dashcam plugged in since day one... I accidentally unplugged the power cable and the camera died within 30 seconds. No big deal though, i just plugged it back in. Aside from that, the thing has worked flawlessly. Sure the time/date is wrong, but who cares. This is by far the best dashcam I have used so far. I have had 3 others, two cheaper ones and a more expensive one. All of which are in the garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: lustro

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for about a year now and it has worked great up until a few weeks ago. Now it is no longer reliable. Recently, for some reason, the camera refuses to recognize the same SD card I have been using for almost a year upon start up. I have to restart the camera several times before the camera is able to recognize the SD card and start recording. This is a very time consuming and frustrating process that I have to do every time I start up my car. Im currently very annoyed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Doza

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy for WiFi .
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a WiFi camera to easily transfer videos to my phone to share....it doesn’t work. It’s terrible. My third dash cam, was hoping it would be better quality since I paid more, but doesn’t seem to be. Also, it doesn’t have another charging port so can’t charge anything else while traveling and using the camera. Don’t want to hard wire it. Will use a little more and update if needed. Sure wish the WiFi was better
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Catalano

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why its 5 star rated item
customer_reviews.text: The camera angle is very skewed even though they advise a wide-angle. Once it gets attached to the windshield, in reality, it only shows half of the windshield. The camera quality is great...but only when not in motion. If you ever try to capture a license plate while driving it seems that is never focused. Very much disappointed at a camera that cost $100.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and hardwire
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the easy installation. I expected the hiding of the cable to take a lot of time and be very challenging. I used the hardwired kit and the most difficult part was reaching the grounding bolt under the dash. All in all the install took approximately 30 min in a 2014 Qx60 . This car had an empty slot in the fuse block that allowed the camera to plug right in. The camera ships with a plastic tool that helps you to tuck the cable behind the headliner and trim. Overall very pleased with the cam and the ease of the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Simple and just plan works.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to use. I like how you can adjust the camera up and down to adjust to any window. It has different options you can change. I played with it and changed them all for a while, but end up going back to the manufacturer defaults as I found those to be the best for me. It really is a simple "plug and play". I don't worry about it and just know it's there for when and if I ever need it. Oh and even if you are not the one in the accident you can easily with the hit of one button "lock" a video of something that happened right in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Man

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price with excellent video quality!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second dashcam for my wife's car. The video quality is excellent, except when driving directly into the sun. I have a 64GB card that captures a couple weeks worth the video. (It's set for a 10-minute loop, and I drive about 90 minutes each day.) Unfortunately, I do live in Phoenix, so I need to take it down from the window when I'm parked in the sun. I know it's rated quite high for temperature, but when it's 115 degrees outside, the windows are closed, and the sun's beating-down, I'm certain it would go above the camera's ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Update: I had problems with the dash cam but they sent me a replacement, and it has been working flawlessly. The fact that they have great customer support makes a world of different. Original post: These camera have battery issues. unless you drive your car every day to charge the internal battery, otherwise, the battery will die and the date and time of the camera will reset to 1/1/2016 or whatever the default date and time is. I have 3 of these camera. 2 of the them have battery issues within a year. the problem is if you got an accident, you will not be able to use the footage because the date and time is not correct.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E&L

customer_reviews.title: You cannot afford to not have one of these in your vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: Say goodbye to he said/she said accidents!! This is my third dash camera purchase and I refuse to drive my commute without a camera in the car. I have been in two accidents in the past year, neither of which were my fault. But the insurance companies, in both accidents, were pushing to split fault and have me pay a portion of the repairs based on the statements given by the drivers of the other vehicles. In both cases, as soon as I shared the dash camera footage, the insurance companies assumed 100% liability. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works so far.  Has already paid for itself.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and setup. The video is pretty clear. I used it recently in a parking lot accident. The other driver began to lie about the accident and who was at fault until I told him I had a dash cam that recorded the incident. He was silent. I uploaded the video to a private link on YouTube because the video file is too large to email. Most servers only allow 35mb or smaller. I gave the link to the insurance adjuster and the other drivers insurance company immediately accepted liability. It paid for itself. I used a 64 gb high endurance sd card. Files are are about 150mb for 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Best camera on the market!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very easy to install and the picture quality is great. I am surprised the picture quality is very good even in low lit areas. We did not have a problem seeing license plates at night. After mounting it the first week, we already caught multiple incidents of near accidents that the camera footage would have saved us hefty insurance hikes. My husband wants to buy one for each car in our household. The company's s customer service is very good and fast. They really want you to be completely satisfied with your product.
customer_reviews.author: hkopinions

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: First of all the camera is not staying still on the windshield, it's shaking when driving. Also display shows clear image only on a specific view angle, if looking at display from driver's seat, you can see a darker image. Third issue is power button, it just is not working all the time. Sometimes I'm able to shut the camera down, but after that when I press again on power button it does nothing, so to turn it on I'm unplugging the cable and plug it back. Disappointed. I understand that the price is low, but after reading the reviews I was expecting a decent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Radu

customer_reviews.title: Smaller & lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller and lighter than expected. Not a problem, a plus. Very easy to locate near rear view mirror. Some features don't operate as described, but i'm sure after a few weeks i'll figure it out. Since it is always connected to a power source, i wish there was a motion sensor in it that recorded only when movement was detected. I park in the yard and to record during the entire night seems to be a waste. I have to review the entire time scale to see if anything was captured. Otherwise, a good product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quality product AND customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not even sure how long I've had this cam.... it's been a long while. It's worked perfectly since day one. The mount is fantastic which makes the cam easy to remove (to avoid theft when parked or those FL days when your car melts in the heat!!). I needed a windshield replacement a few months ago and although I got my mount off, I wasn't confident in the adhesive integrity so I emailed them and they sent me a whole new mount for my new windshield - no issues at all. Arrived in a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Porter

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like the design that makes the lens closer to the windshield and the quality of the video better. It also looks smaller and ignorable. The wire is a little longer than the other product I bought. The length should be considered if you’re installing on big cars. It also comes with a plastic cable clip to open the panel and hide the wires. I successfully hide all the wires and hook the plug into the glove box. Thanks for the tool. Overall, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Huong Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: I initially got the cheaper version but upgraded to this one so I could connect to it with my phone. It has the worst compatibility I've ever seen, I've only connected to it twice because I have to uninstall the app from my iPhone every time I want to see it and even then it won't connect until it miraculously decides it wants to. The cam also doesn't write over older videos and there's no setting to change this. I got a 'refurbished' version on this site, maybe it's fake, I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Jombo

customer_reviews.title: Still works great after 3 years of continuous use...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dashcam January 2017 and hardwired it to run 24/7 since I had a "park by feel" guy in the neighborhood. I pulled the footage the this morning after someone used my truck to do some custom pin-striping on their BMW. The camera is still running fine; the footage was great. I do have to reformat the card every couple of months but that does not bother me. That was a know issue when I bought the camera and, even if they if they fixed it in the firmware (I assume so), I don't care enough to update it. It is a great product and I would buy it again if I needed another.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I'm confused, got 2 different models.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these on Prime Day, and when they arrived, I got 2 different models; even though the labeling says they're both Rexing v1. The yellow box(left) model, uses a super capacitor and can only record in 1,2, and 3 minute loops. The cardboard box(right) model, uses a battery and can record in 3, 5, and 10 minute loops. I'm pretty sure the cardboard box model is the correct one. Now that begs the question, what model is the yellow box one? Help would be appreciated. Thanks! **Note** the 3-star rating does not reflect product quality. It's just a temporary placeholder. ***Update*** switched to 5 star after they resolved the issue
customer_reviews.author: Nang Quach

customer_reviews.title: The picture and sound is great. One recommendation is to go with their suggest ...
customer_reviews.text: Had an initial problem with this camera, but Rexing replaced it immediately. Ever since then I've had zero issues. The picture and sound is great. One recommendation is to go with their suggest micro sd card. I do like the shape of this unit since it fits more flush with my windshield and less obvious than hanging on my rear view mirror. Update, the recommend micro sd card brand is Lexar.
customer_reviews.author: Jad Musallam

customer_reviews.title: - Great film quality for the price - Lines up hidden ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Great film quality for the price - Lines up hidden behind the rear view mirror; hardly notice that it's even there - Left on windshield in high 90's and still functional Cons: - Material made of plastic - Glitches in the recording; frame would freeze from time to time - Uses a permanent mount on windshield; would be better if it was detachable and portable so that I can use it from car to car - Night vision - is better than the V1 but not perfectly clear; still needs improvement Overall: - Great buy for the price; serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: BTrinh

product_meta.title: Rexing V1-4K Ultra HD Car Dash Cam 2.4" LCD Screen, Wi-Fi, 170° Wide Angle Dashboard Camera Recorder with G-Sensor, WDR, Loop Recording, Supercapacitor, Mobile App, 256GB Supported
feature_bullets: ULTRA HD DISCREET DESIGN DASH CAM: Top OV4689 image sensor captures beautiful 2160p video even while driving fast. Signature low-profile design allows the V1 to be a well-hidden witness to the road ahead. Supports high-endurance micro SD memory cards up to 256GB in memory size.

170 DEGREE ULTRA WIDE ANGLE LENS & WIDE DYNAMIC RANGE: The 7 layer glass lens opens up to capture a sweeping view of your surroundings. The superior WDR technology allows the camera to perform optimally in any lighting situation by adjusting the exposure to create balanced images and footage.

SUPERCAPACITOR & PARKING MONITOR: The dash cam uses a supercapacitor which can withstand extreme temperatures from -20 to 176°F, that prevents the risk of overheating, extends the life span and reliability of the camera. With the parking monitor feature, the dash camera will automatically turn on and record a 20 second video when the car camera detects vibration OR dash cam will capture frames for a time lapse video for 24/7. Please connect the smart hardwire kit to activate the parking mode.
WIFI CONNECT: View, save, and share dash cam recordings wirelessly on your mobile device with the use of an app interface.

LOOP RECORDING AND G-SENSOR: Video can be recorded in 1,2 or 3 minute intervals. When the storage limit is reached on the memory card, new recordings will automatically overwrite the oldest recordings. When the built-in gravity sensor detects a collision, the current video is locked, ensuring important footage is kept protected. Locked videos will be kept safe from being overwritten.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars9,911 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
